hints.text: I am small, but I decide how far you can go.
hints.explanationText: A passport's power determines where and how freely a person can travel.

hints.text: My pages tell a story mostly through marks, not sentences.
hints.explanationText: Stamps, visas, and entry marks show travel history without needing narrative text.

hints.text: Some versions of me open far more doors than others.
hints.explanationText: Different passports grant very different levels of visa-free access.

hints.text: I am issued by a state to certify nationality.
hints.explanationText: A passport formally confirms the holder's nationality.

hints.text: I am required to cross most international borders.
hints.explanationText: This defines the passport's core function.

solutionExplanation: All hints point to a passport, a state-issued document that certifies nationality, records travel, and determines how freely someone can cross international borders.
